column4: / AlexMax: i prefer putting the module in mods-available and then using a2enmod to enabled it.. although i guess that's just a symlink to mods-enabled?
That is correct, the a2enmod creates the symlink
aha ok, i just have a tendency to make the symlink wrong the first time systematically, so i taught myself to use a2enmod instead hahaha
AlexMax: but you are correct, the proper way to do it should be create the .conf and .load in mods-available and them activate them using a2enmod
